name: Chayamukhi
overview:
Chayamukhi is a social utility that connects people with friends and others who work, study and live around them. People use Chayamukhi to keep up with friends, upload an unlimited number of photos, share links and videos, and learn more about the people they meet.

Chayamukhi is an online community where you can find people, your friends, albums, videos, etc. Chayamukhiâ€™s social network can help you maintain existing relationships with pictures and messages, and establish new ones by reaching out to people you have never met before. Your interaction with Chayamukhi members is entirely up to you. Before getting to know a Chaymukhi member, you can read their profile and even see how they are connected to you through the friends network.

To join Chaymukhi, simply sign in with your basic information and you can begin to create your own profile right away. The name Chayamukhi is taken from the Drama Chayamukhi â€“ Mirroring the mind. Chayamukhi is our effort to help you find those you are looking for.
